members.name: height
members.descriptionHtml: Sets the height of the shimmer circle in pixels. Minimum supported 10px.

members.name: height
members.descriptionHtml: Sets the height of the shimmer gap in pixels.

members.name: width
members.descriptionHtml: Gap width value.

members.name: height
members.descriptionHtml: Sets the height of the shimmer line in pixels.

members.name: width
members.descriptionHtml: Line width value.

tables.name: IShimmerColors
tables.descriptionHtml: Interface describing the possible color customizations of Shimmer.

members.name: background
members.descriptionHtml: Defines the background color of the space in between and around shimmer elements (borders, gaps and rounded corners).

members.name: shimmer
members.descriptionHtml: Defines the main background color which is the color you see when the wave is not animating.

members.name: shimmerWave
members.descriptionHtml: Defines the tip color of the shimmer wave which gradually gets from and to `shimmer` color.

tables.name: IShimmerElement
tables.descriptionHtml: Shimmer Elements Interface representing all common properties between Gap, Circle and Line.

members.name: height
members.descriptionHtml: Sets the height of the element (ICircle, ILine, IGap) in pixels. Read more details for each specific element.

members.name: type
members.descriptionHtml: Represents the possible type of the shimmer elements: Gap, Circle, Line. Required for every element you intend to use.

members.name: verticalAlign
members.descriptionHtml: Sets vertical alignment of the element (ICircle, ILine).

members.name: width
members.descriptionHtml: Sets the width value of the element (ILine, IGap) in pixels. Read more details for each specific element.

members.name: ariaLabel
members.descriptionHtml: Localized string of the status label for screen reader

members.name: className
members.descriptionHtml: Additional CSS class(es) to apply to the Shimmer container.

members.name: componentRef
members.descriptionHtml: Optional callback to access the IShimmer interface. Use this instead of ref for accessing the public methods and properties of the component.

members.name: customElementsGroup
members.descriptionHtml: Custom elements when necessary to build complex placeholder skeletons.

members.name: isDataLoaded
members.descriptionHtml: Controls when the shimmer is swapped with actual data through an animated transition.

members.name: shimmerColors
members.descriptionHtml: Defines an object with possible colors to pass for Shimmer customization used on different backgrounds.

members.name: shimmerElements
members.descriptionHtml: Elements to render in one line of the Shimmer.

members.name: styles
members.descriptionHtml: Call to provide customized styling that will layer on top of the variant rules.

members.name: theme
members.descriptionHtml: Theme provided by High-Order Component.

members.name: width
members.descriptionHtml: Sets the width value of the shimmer wave wrapper.

tables.name: IShimmerStyleProps
tables.descriptionHtml: Defines props needed to construct styles. This represents the simplified set of immutable things which control the class names.

members.name: className
members.descriptionHtml: Optional CSS class name for the component attached to the root stylable area.

members.name: isDataLoaded
members.descriptionHtml: Boolean flag to trigger fadeIn/fadeOut transition animation when content is loaded.

members.name: shimmerColor
members.descriptionHtml: Color to be used as the main background color of Shimmer when not animating.

members.name: shimmerWaveColor
members.descriptionHtml: Tip color of the shimmer wave which gradually gets from and to `shimmerColor`.

members.name: theme
members.descriptionHtml: Theme provided by High-Order Component.

members.name: transitionAnimationInterval
members.descriptionHtml: Interval in milliseconds for the adeIn/fadeOut transition animation.

tables.name: IShimmerStyles
tables.descriptionHtml: Represents the stylable areas of the control.

members.name: dataWrapper
members.descriptionHtml: Refers to wrapper element of the children only.

members.name: root
members.descriptionHtml: Refers to the root wrapper element.

members.name: screenReaderText
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for the hidden helper element to aid with screen readers.

members.name: shimmerWrapper
members.descriptionHtml: Refers to wrapper element of the shimmer animation only.

tables.name: ShimmerElementsDefaultHeights
tables.descriptionHtml: Describes the default heights for shimmer elements when omitted in implementation.

members.name: circle
members.descriptionHtml: Default height of the circle element when not provided by user: 24px

members.name: gap
members.descriptionHtml: Default height of the gap element when not provided by user: 16px

members.name: line
members.descriptionHtml: Default height of the line element when not provided by user: 16px

tables.name: ShimmerElementType
tables.descriptionHtml: Describes the possible types for shimmer elements used.

members.name: circle
members.descriptionHtml: Circle element type

members.name: gap
members.descriptionHtml: Gap element type

members.name: line
members.descriptionHtml: Line element type
